description: Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 6,100 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Flame Shock damage over time critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fire Elemental by 1.0 sec, and Flame Shock has a 50% increased critical strike chance.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: For every 15 seconds that you do not cast Shadow Mend, the healing of your next Shadow Mend is increased by 50%.  This effect can stack up to 4 times.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 6,247 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.

Equip: In Bear Form, Thrash has a 15% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

Thrash grants you an absorb shield for 75% of all damage it deals.
Equip: After activating Symbols of Death, your next Shadowstrike or Backstab deals 50% increased damage and generates 4 additional combo points.
Equip: Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 20 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target, your Mind Blast deals 55% more damage.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.

Equip: Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains 2% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to 100%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for 20 sec, blasting your target for 1,005 Shadow damage.
Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.
Equip: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing damage equal to 20% of the Holy Shock every 6 sec. Can protect up to 5 targets.

Equip: Healing with Enveloping Mists or Vivify while channeling Soothing Mists increases their healing done by 20% and reduces their mana cost by 20%. Stacks up to 3 times.

When your Soothing Mists channel ends, this effect is cancelled.
Equip: Spear of Bastion's duration is increased by 4 sec. While you remain within Spear of Bastion's area your critical strike damage is increased by 25%.

Equip: Dropping Windfury Totem grants you 100% chance to gain Windfury Weapon and increases Windfury Weapon damage by 25% for 12 sec. 

This can only occur once every 1 min.

Equip: You and your Kindred Spirit each gain a bonus secondary stat based on their Covenant. This bonus is doubled while the bond is Empowered.

Kyrian: Mastery increased by 150.
Night Fae: Haste increased by 8%.
Venthyr: Critical Strike chance increased by 8%.
Necrolord: Versatility increased by 8%.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.
Equip: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing damage equal to 20% of the Holy Shock every 6 sec. Can protect up to 5 targets.

Equip: Dropping Windfury Totem grants you 100% chance to gain Windfury Weapon and increases Windfury Weapon damage by 25% for 12 sec. 

This can only occur once every 1 min.
